The Sense-Sphere Group
What are the ideas belonging to the sense sphere?

original: Kāmāvacarakusalaṁ, akusalaṁ, sabbo kāmāvacarassa vipāko, kāmāvacarakiriyābyākataṁ, sabbañca rūpaṁ—

translated: Profitable, unprofitable, and all resultant ideas of the sense sphere, all functional indeterminate ideas of the sense sphere, and all materiality—

Those of the fine-material sphere, those of the immaterial sphere, and those that are unincluded—
these are the ideas not belonging to the sense sphere.
The Fine-Material-Sphere Group
What are the ideas belonging to the fine-material sphere?

original: Rūpāvacaracatukkapañcakajjhānā kusalato ca vipākato ca kiriyato ca—

translated: The four and five jhānas of the fine-material sphere, as wholesome, as result, and as functional,
are fine-material.
Which are the ideas not of the fine-material sphere?
Those of the sense sphere, those of the immaterial sphere, and those unincluded,
are ideas not of the fine-material sphere.
… Immaterial-Sphere-Ideas
Which are the ideas of the immaterial sphere?

original: Cattāro āruppā kusalato ca vipākato ca kiriyato ca—

translated: The four immaterial states, as wholesome, as result, and as functional,

Which are the ideas not of the immaterial sphere?
Those of the sense sphere, those of the fine-material sphere, and those unincluded,
are ideas not of the immaterial sphere.
… Included-Ideas
Which are the ideas included?

these things have conflict.
